name: Eyehawk Challenge
description:
Are you a tennis fan? Is your sight good enough to catch the right position of each ball touch? 

Eyehawk Challenge is an infinite mini-game where you will have to call each time this crazy tennis ball bounces out of the marked area. Simple, addictive and perfect to test your own eyes with each bounce.

Features

Eye-hawk animation: with each out call you'll see exactly how close was the ball to the line, no cheating.

Free movement: move your camera and look wherever you prefer for a better sigh.

Dynamic movement: the ball can bounce literally anywhere and it can have different speeds, make sure you don't lose a single bounce.

Simple and addictive:  forget the long cinematics and complicated menus, in a couple of seconds you'll be playing without delay.
